Text.Name: Secrets_Gong2
Text.Desc: [NAME] arrived at [PLACE] and discovered that this is the place that had inherited the teachings of the "กฎสมบัติเหลือคณนา." The inheritance is surrounded by a circle of ancient Immortals. It seems that this is the seal set by the ancient Immortal to select the candidates suitable to inherit their teachings. There is lightning shooting out from the array, it seems like it possesses great magical power.

Text.Name: Secrets_GongRandom
Text.Desc: [NAME] arrived at [PLACE] and discovered a mysterious Law, though knew not whence it came.
